mapper.select: SELECT *,(g.`采购支出`+g.`收支流水`+g.`费用报销`) as '总计' FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m') AS `month1` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 5 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 6 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 7 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 8 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 9 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 10 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((#{date} - INTERVAL 11 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` ) AS a left join ( select DATE_FORMAT(cgdate, '%Y-%m') as `month2`,sum(summoney) as '采购支出' from crm_purchase group by year(cgdate),month(cgdate) ) AS b on a.month1=b.month2 )as c left join ( select DATE_FORMAT(mdate, '%Y-%m') as `month3`,sum(moneyout) as '收支流水' from crm_revenue_expenditure group by year(mdate),month(mdate) ) as d on c.month1 = d.month3 ) as e left join ( select DATE_FORMAT(fy_askdate, '%Y-%m') as `month4`,sum(fy_summoney) as '费用报销' from crm_reimburse group by year(fy_askdate),month(fy_askdate) ) as f on e.month1 = f.month4 ) as g
SELECT p.cgdate as '支出日期',p.gysid AS '对应客户' ,p.cgname AS '备注', p.empid AS '开支人员', p.summoney AS '开支金额' FROM crm_purchase p WHERE DATE_FORMAT( p.cgdate, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(#{date} , '%Y%m' )
